text: "BedRock" is the second single off hip hop group Young Money Entertainment's debut compilation album We Are Young Money. The song was released on November 14, 2009. It was also released on the "Complete Edition" 2020 reissue version of Nicki Minaj's debut studio album, Pink Friday. Omarion originally sung the chorus for the song but was replaced on the song by Lloyd after Omarion left the Young Money label. On December 7, 2009, a music video for the song was released. It debuted on 106 & Park. It featured the members of Young Money Entertainment living in a mansion and shows an average day for them. In August 2011, Lil Wayne was sued for copyright infringement by Done Deal Enterprises for $15 million. ==References== ==Other websites== *"BedRock" on YouTube Category:2009 songs Category:Drake (musician) songs Category:Lil Wayne songs Category:Nicki Minaj songs
title: BedRock (song)
